LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.ExpressCartWishlist.Admin.Configure.Info
LocaleResource.Value: Note:In order to use this functionality, you have to disable the following setting: Shopping cart settings > Display cart after adding a product and Display wishlist after adding a product.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.ExpressCartWishlist.Admin.Configure.Fields.ExpressCartEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check/uncheck to enable/disable this plugin on "Add To Cart".

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.ExpressCartWishlist.Admin.Configure.Fields.ExpressWishlistEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check/uncheck to enable/disable this plugin on "Add To Wishlist".

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.ExpressCartWishlist.Admin.Configure.Fields.ProductPageAddToCartButtonSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Product page "Add To Cart" button selector

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.ExpressCartWishlist.Admin.Configure.Fields.ProductPageAddToCartButtonSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the product page "Add To Cart" button on the product details page.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.ExpressCartWishlist.Admin.Configure.Fields.ProductBoxProductItemElementSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Product box product item element selector

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.ExpressCartWishlist.Admin.Configure.Fields.ProductBoxProductItemElementSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This selector for the product item element within the product box holds the ID of the product.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.ExpressCartWishlist.Admin.Configure.Fields.ProductBoxAddToCartButtonSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Product box "Add To Cart" button selector

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.ExpressCartWishlist.Admin.Configure.Fields.ProductBoxAddToCartButtonSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the product box "Add To Cart" button. The product box is used for listing products on pages.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.ExpressCartWishlist.Admin.Configure.Fields.ProductAddToWishlistButtonSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the "Add To Wishlist" button.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.ExpressCartWishlist.Admin.Configure.Fields.ProductAddToCartWishlistImageSize
LocaleResource.Value: Product added to cart and wishlist image size

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.ExpressCartWishlist.Admin.Configure.Fields.ProductAddToCartWishlistImageSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify the image size of the image displayed on the product added to cart and wishlist popup.
